summary: This document appears to be a brief internal communication from August 2019 discussing attempts to confirm whether Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch and advising to stick to a script when commenting. It references a specific file number and includes a timestamp.

events.title: Inquiry about Epstein's suicide watch status
events.description: An individual is trying to confirm if Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch.

events.title: Communication about sticking to script
events.description: A reminder is sent to stick to a script regarding comments, and a file is referenced as being sent.

keyFacts: The document references ongoing efforts in August 2019 to confirm Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch status.
It contains instructions to 'stick to the script' and use the phrase 'Can't comment on that' when discussing the matter.
The communication is dated shortly before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, indicating post-death inquiries.
It includes a specific file reference: SDN,00008136 EFTA00128629.
